Uses of Interface
org.pipservices3.commons.validate.IValidationRule

Packages that use IValidationRule
Package Description
org.pipservices3.commons.validate  

  • Uses of IValidationRule in org.pipservices3.commons.validate

    Classes in org.pipservices3.commons.validate that implement IValidationRule
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AndRule
    Validation rule to combine rules with AND logical operation.
    class  AtLeastOneExistsRule
    Validation rule that check that at least one of the object properties is not null.
    class  ExcludedRule
    Validation rule to check that value is excluded from the list of constants.
    class  IncludedRule
    Validation rule to check that value is included into the list of constants.
    class  NotRule
    Validation rule negate another rule.
    class  OnlyOneExistsRule
    Validation rule that check that at exactly one of the object properties is not null.
    class  OrRule
    Validation rule to combine rules with OR logical operation.
    class  PropertiesComparisonRule
    Validation rule that compares two object properties.
    class  ValueComparisonRule
    Validation rule that compares value to a constant.
    Methods in org.pipservices3.commons.validate that return types with arguments of type IValidationRule
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<IValidationRule> Schema.getRules()
    Gets validation rules to check values against.
    Methods in org.pipservices3.commons.validate with parameters of type IValidationRule
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ObjectSchema ObjectSchema.withOptionalProperty​(String name, Object type, IValidationRule... rules)
    Adds a validation schema for an optional object property.
    ObjectSchema ObjectSchema.withRequiredProperty​(String name, Object type, IValidationRule... rules)
    Adds a validation schema for a required object property.
    Schema Schema.withRule​(IValidationRule rule)
    Adds validation rule to this schema.
    Method parameters in org.pipservices3.commons.validate with type arguments of type IValidationRule
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Schema.setRules​(List<IValidationRule> value)
    Sets validation rules to check values against.
    Constructors in org.pipservices3.commons.validate with parameters of type IValidationRule
    Constructor Description
    AndRule​(IValidationRule... rules)
    Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.
    NotRule​(IValidationRule rule)
    Creates a new validation rule and sets its values
    OrRule​(IValidationRule... rules)
    Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.
    Constructor parameters in org.pipservices3.commons.validate with type arguments of type IValidationRule
    Constructor Description
    Schema​(boolean required, List<IValidationRule> rules)
    Creates a new instance of validation schema and sets its values.
